languages.text: "Будьте опорой и поддержкой друг другу. Мы все преодолеем и всего добьемся — но лишь сообща. Потому что в мире нет большей силы, чем наша сплоченность".

traits.locale_text: "Я скажу прямо и от сердца. Люди, будьте друг другу братьями. Мы все преодолеем и всего добьемся — но только вместе. Потому что в мире нет большей силы, чем наша сплоченность".

languages.text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
languages.original_text: "Будьте опорой и поддержкой друг другу. Мы все преодолеем и всего добьемся — но лишь сообща. Потому что в мире нет большей силы, чем наша сплоченность".

traits.locale_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for and prevail — but only together can we do so. For there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
"May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for and prevail — but only together can we do so. For there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
"May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
"May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
"May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."
"May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

languages.text: “愿你们每个人都能成为彼此的支柱。我们必将实现我们所追求的目标，我们必将获得胜利。不过，唯有团结才能带来胜利，因为只有团结才能无坚不摧。”
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: “愿你们每个人都能成为彼此的支柱。我们必将实现我们所追求的目标，我们必将获得胜利。不过，唯有团结才能带来胜利，因为只有团结才能无坚不摧。”

languages.text: «Sed los cimientos sobre los que se sustentan otros. Conseguiremos todo cuanto nos propongamos, y prevaleceremos; pero solo si lo hacemos juntos, pues no existe fuerza más poderosa en la existencia que nuestra unidad».
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: «Sed los cimientos sobre los que se sustentan otros. Conseguiremos todo cuanto nos propongamos, y prevaleceremos; pero solo si lo hacemos juntos, pues no existe fuerza más poderosa en la existencia que nuestra unidad».

languages.text: "Birbirinizin dayanağı olun. Uğruna çabaladığımız her şeyi başaracağımızdan ve muzaffer olacağımızdan hiç şüphe etmeyin. Bunu ancak birlikte yapabiliriz zira varoluşta birliğimizden daha büyük bir güç yoktur."
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: "Birbirinizin dayanağı olun. Uğruna çabaladığımız her şeyi başaracağımızdan ve muzaffer olacağımızdan hiç şüphe etmeyin. Bunu ancak birlikte yapabiliriz zira varoluşta birliğimizden daha büyük bir güç yoktur."

languages.text: 「互いの支えとなることを願う。{mf|俺|私}たちは求めるものすべてを達成し、圧倒するが、一緒にいることでのみそうすることができる。なぜなら、{mf|俺|私}たちの団結以上に強力なものが存在しないからである」
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: 「互いの支えとなることを願う。{mf|俺|私}たちは求めるものすべてを達成し、圧倒するが、一緒にいることでのみそうすることができる。なぜなら、{mf|俺|私}たちの団結以上に強力なものが存在しないからである」

languages.text: « Puissiez-vous être chacun un soutien pour les autres. Tous, nous atteindrons nos objectifs, et tous, nous vaincrons... mais nous n'y parviendrons qu'ensemble, car il n'est de plus grande force que notre unité. »
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: « Puissiez-vous être chacun un soutien pour les autres. Tous, nous atteindrons nos objectifs, et tous, nous vaincrons... mais nous n'y parviendrons qu'ensemble, car il n'est de plus grande force que notre unité. »

languages.text: "Möget Ihr einander tragende Stützen sein. Wir werden alles erreichen, wonach wir streben, und wir werden obsiegen. Das jedoch gelingt uns nur gemeinsam, denn es gibt keine größere Macht als unsere Einheit."
languages.original_text: "May you be each other's pillars of support. We shall achieve all we strive for, and we shall prevail — but only together can we do so, for there is no greater force in existence than our unity."

traits.locale_text: "Möget Ihr einander tragende Stützen sein. Wir werden alles erreichen, wonach wir streben, und wir werden obsiegen. Das jedoch gelingt uns nur gemeinsam, denn es gibt keine größere Macht als unsere Einheit."
